entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • ServerNotAvailableException upon EventPipeSession shutting down (appears to be application shutting down) #2356
    6.0.0
  • [dotnet-trace] Display help text for rundown #959
    7.0.0

Updated

  • Document the EventPipeFormat in this repository #804
    7.0.0
  • [Documentation] Document known caveats to diagnostic tools #1737
    7.0.0
  • [Documentation] EventSource documentation improvement #1736
    7.0.0
  • [Regions] Avoid using allocation_started for USE_REGIONS #2483
    7.0.0
  • gcdump fails to collect dump under high load. #2404
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-sos install fails on Apple M1 #2370
    7.0.0
  • Feature: Support Percentiles and multi-dimension metrics in dotnet-counters #2368
    7.0.0
  • dotnet trace with EtwSelfDescribingEventFormat produces unreadable events #2367
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-counters in Azure Kudu/Console. #2323
    7.0.0
  • Diposing Stream from EventPipeSession during unit test causes segfault on Linux and OSX #2223
    7.0.0
  • should_check_bgc_mark and fgc_should_consider_object need to be updated for regions #2208
    7.0.0
  • Verify dotnet-dump and createdump work with user namespace remapping #2150
    7.0.0
  • [macos] Shipping dotnet-* tools unsigned #1942
    7.0.0
  • Make sure we are properly publishing bundled-tools symbols #1631
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-trace CLI output doesn't update under low frequency events #474
    Future
  • dotnet tools shouldn't error if no arguments are provided #510
    7.0.0
  • dotnet trace on x86_64 ubuntu 21.10 linux does not capture CPU time #2731
    7.0.0
  • dotnet trace collect does not preserve instrumented application's stdout #2729
    7.0.0
  • spurious Carriage-Return (Control M) in linux output #2728
    Future
  • Empty .Net Trace File generated #2654
    7.0.0
  • `dotnet-trace`: WSL2 issues when using `/mnt/c` #2628
    7.0.0
  • Activity Ids not assigned to Activity tracked events when using certain provider strings #2611
    7.0.0
  • `EventSource` should mention some built-in types require special handling #2608
    7.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Add support for reporting with pprof's profile.proto format in CLI tools #2563
    7.0.0
  • Binaries are not signed and fail to run on macOS Monterey with .NET 6 ARM64 runtime #2554
    7.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Add flag to WriteDump Apis to hide the entire console. #2736
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Better rundown defaults and parameterization #2732
  • Fix some workflow issues #2720
  • initial pull request for dotnet-trace report (topN feature) #2705
    dotnet-trace
